description:
OfficeTime is an amazingly intuitive time tracker. Where other time keepers are clumsy or oversimplified, OfficeTime balances features and ease of use, allowing you to easily track exactly what you do each day.  

Effortlessly capture your hours and expenses. Easily track your projects and life.  Designed for freelancers and small teams.

* Track by project and category
* Multiple hourly rates
* Run multiple timers
* Rapidly switch tasks
* Time in the background
* Pay no monthly fees
* Work offline. No need for WiFi or 3G
* Works on iOS 6, iOS 7 and iOS 8
* Compatible with the new iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus. (But doesn't do landscape mode right now. Sorry.)

Upgrade to the full version to:
*  Track unlimited projects and categories
*  Export to Excel or Numbers
*  Report by custom dates
*  Sync to OfficeTime on your Mac or PC (sold separately) 
*  Get cross team reports on your Mac / PC (sold separately) 
*  And of course, keep all of your data when you upgrade

releaseNotes:
We've been working hard to make your life easy.  This release contains over 80 little refinements to make things smoother.

We're always listening. How can we make tracking your time even easier? Email us at support@officetime.net
